thread.title: MMI (An INC. 5000 Fastest Growing Company) to Exhibit at the Technology Services World 2015 Service Transformation Conference
thread.title_full: MMI (An INC. 5000 Fastest Growing Company) to Exhibit at the Technology Services World 2015 Service Transformation Conference

author: Patricia McLoughlin
title: MMI (An INC. 5000 Fastest Growing Company) to Exhibit at the Technology Services World 2015 Service Transformation Conference
text:
MMI announced today that it will exhibit at the upcoming Technology Services World (TSW) 2015 Service Transformations Conference being held in Las Vegas, October 19 – 21. MMI will share the four ways automated renewals will transform your business. “MMI is pleased to participate in the TSW Service Transformation Conference and join fellow TSW Advisory Board members for discussions around current trends in the marketplace,” commented MMI CEO Tina Lux-Boim. “There has been a lot of buzz and excitement around MMI products and services and we are pleased to share that excitement with other industry leaders. The recognition by Inc. Magazine as one of the 5000 fastest-growing companies is a testament to how MMI enables organizations to transform their business. Companies in every industry know they need to move faster and innovate quickly to survive. This challenge is a massive undertaking. MMI helps its clients transform the traditional support and maintenance renewal business into flexible, responsive, flat organizations built for speed through automating renewals and quoting.”
MMI provides solutions to companies on a global scale driving benefits in four areas – developing more profitable services revenue streams, keeping competition out of your accounts, acquiring new accounts, and using the collected data to generate new business opportunities – all while streamlining and simplifying the entire process of managing IT assets, warranties, and service contracts.
The conference, hosted by Technology Services Industry Association (TSIA), takes place October 19 – 21, 2015 at the ARIA Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, NV. “The conference focus for TSW 2015 Service Transformations is thought leadership and the transformation of the service business ’” said John Ragsdale, Vice President of Technology and Social Research for TSIA. “In the spirit of this focus, we are honored to have MMI, a recognized market leader, participate in TSW. Our TSW audience has come to know MMI as being on the leading edge of service revenue generation, and we look forward to sharing the TSW experience with our conference attendees.”
Visit MMI during the TSW 2015 Service Transformations at the ARIA Resort and Casino, Booth #21.
About Managed Maintenance, Inc. Headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida, MMI solutions enable technology manufacturers (OEMs), their channel partners, distributors, and service providers to maximize service contract and equipment replacement revenues, and help end-user organizations ensure uninterrupted maintenance and support coverage. MMI offers ONEview, a SaaS application that helps businesses simplify and streamline the entire process of managing IT assets, warranties, and service contracts. Learn more at http://www.managedmaint.com .
